UNIT – III 5. a) Find the Rank of the matrix: A   1 2 3 6 2 4 2 8 3 3 1 7 0 2 3 5  6 . b) Using Gauss Jordan Method find the inverse of A   1 2 1 2 5 0 3 3 8  6 . c) Find the values of k and k such that the system of equations x + y + z = 6, x + 2y + 3z = 6 1 2 10, x + 2y + k z = k may have (i) unique solution (ii) Infinite solution (iii) No Solution. 1 2 d) Solve the following system of equations using Gauss elimination method 7 x 2x x 0, 2x 8x 8, 4x 5x 9x 9 . 1 2 3 2 3 1 2 3 OR 6. a) Reduce the following matrix into normal form and find the rank  3 1 3 2 1 3 5 2 6 7 3 9 1 1 2 5 5  6 . b) Find the inverse of the matrix A   0 1 4 1 0  3 2 3 8  6 if it exists using Gauss Jordan Method. c) Test for consistency and solve x + y + z = 6, x – y + 2z = 5, 3x + y + z =8. 6 d) Solve the following system of equations using Gauss Jordan method 7 2x + 5y + 7z = 52, 2x + y - z = 0, x + y + z = 9. UNIT – IV

a) If x C o s y S i n      and x S i n y C o s      write the matrix A of this transformation 6 and prove that A1  A. Also write the inverse transformation. b) Find a matrix P which diagonalize the matrix A   4 2 1 3  6 and verify P1APD, where D is the diagonal matrix. c) Find the largest Eigen value and corresponding Eigen vector of the matrix Page 3 of 3 A    6 2 2  3  2 1 2  3 1  using Rayleigh’s Power method. Take X 0  [ 1 0 0 ] T 6 as initial Eigen vector. a) Show that the transformation: y 1  x 1  2 x 2  5 x 3 , y 2  2 x 1  4 x 2  1 1 x 3 , y x 2x is 6 3 2 3 regular and find the inverse transformation. b) Find the eigen values and the eigen vectors of the matrix A   1 3 2  2 1 1 4   1 1  6 . c) Using Rayleigh’s Power method, find the largest Eigen value and corresponding Eigen  2 1 0    vector of the matrix A 1 2 1 .Take     0 1 2   X 0  [ 1 1 1 ] T 6 as initial Eigen vector. Carryout 3 approximations. d) Given that A    1 0  2 i 1  0 2 i  , show that  1  A   1  A   1 7 is a unitary matrix. *** SRN 1st/2nd Semester B.Tech CV/ECE/EEE/CSE/C&IT Semester End Examination August 2023
